docs.text: Welcome to Charts This is a collection of helm charts that I've worked on for my Kubernetes cluster at home. Using the Charts helm repo add bbrietzke http://helmcharts.duckdns.org or helm repo add bbrietzke http://bbrietzke.github.io/charts Chart Layout volumes : creates 3 10Gi volumes, 4 100Gi volumes and 3 20Gi volumes. Also can create local volumes. Automation There is a Makefile included that will help automate a number of the steps to publish the charts. The typical workflow includes: make index publish Commands include: publish : use MkDocs to publish to gh-pages branch volumes : package the volumes chart and move it to the correct location index : create or update the index.yaml file
